seo_content:
Exclusive QT Funded Trading Offer

QT Funded, based in South Africa and established in October 2023, is a CFD firm offering two program types: 2 Steps and Instant. The firm supports the MT5, cTrader and TradeLocker trading platforms and offers its 2 Steps and Instant programs on those platforms. QT Funded has a review score of 3.9 out of 5 based on 600 reviews. authenticated by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: QT Funded Promo Code: 45% Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with QT Funded using our exclusive discount code. checked for the current trading season.
